metadata.title: CVE-2017-6816 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In WordPress before 4.7.3 (wp-admin/plugins.php), unintended files can bedeleted by administrators using the plugin deletion functionality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.7.3+dfsg-1').
